comments: Had initially a tough time with the professor. He is an old guy, with very conventional in his teachings. The key word is precision. You have to do everything he says to the bone. Important to be open-minded with the class, as he will come of as abrasive when you make a mistake. He\'s willing to help, but you have to make the effort. Makes it easier

Had to report him to president of university for misconduct in his emails.

comments: Sheldon Weinig is the worst professor I have ever had in my life. Why AMS 441 is given as an AMS course I will never know. It seems like no BUS students wanted to take his course so this course was thrown into AMS. He is incredibly disrespectful. If you want to kiss ass and learn NOTHING about your major then take him. A disgrace to Stony Brook.

comments: He says in the beginning that he wants WINNERS. Take his advice. If you arent, get out. Do what is asked - Exactly what he says, dont be stupid. Take notes and email him with any questions. Stay on top of things, get on his good side and get to know him. Whether its useless, wrong, brilliant or helpful to u, he has a world of knowledge and stories.

comments: Professor Weinig is a very good professor. His emails can come off as a little abrasive - he writes in all caps, for example, but don\'t let this bias you against him - he knows the subject matter very well and is passionate about the subject and his students. He will help those who help themselves. Overall, great guy, and good teacher.
